channel.title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.103.0.VNAMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra Global

Codename: aurora

Version: OS2.0.103.0.VNAMIXM | 15.0

Size: 9.5 GB

MD5: 4311810fbccabe570de54858eab1149c

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to March 2025. Increased system security.
[Xiaomi HyperAI]
Xiaomi HyperAI reshapes system apps with AI, enhancing productivity and usability and creating a dynamic, ever-evolving user experience.
All-new AI writing:
Generate, summarize, expand, polish, and correct text wherever you are with AI writing.
AI audio recognition:
Now, AI can recognize audio and transcribe in real time, summarize automatically, and mark speakers.
All-new AI search:
With AI search, you can find photos, videos, messages, notes, and recordings accurately.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.7.0.UNACNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra China

Codename: aurora

Version: OS1.0.7.0.UNACNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.3 GB

MD5: 81a48e3c208123ca078eb9e7b9ac9368

Changelog:
[System]
New: Camera grip charging options
New: Vital signs info can be included in messages sent via Tiantong Satellite communications (works with Mi Fitness 3.27.2 or later)
New: Emergency SMS can be sent automatically during satellite calls when Emergency SOS is on
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
[Camera]
Optimization: HDR image quality in some scenes
Optimization: Portrait mode image clarity
Optimization: Face brightness algorithms for average exposure metering option
